Name: Average time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to lead to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' after 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average time it takes 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to be followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' until 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' before 'SW-Checklist Completed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time it takes 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' to result in 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'
